title: PMS 2.0 761 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 6 Preview/Picks, Buffalo Bills WR Gabe Davis, & AJ Hawk LIVE From The ThunderDome
description: On today’s show, Pat joins AJ Hawk and the boys LIVE from the set of College GameDay in Knoxville, Tennessee as they react last night’s Thursday Night Football game between the Commanders and the Bears, what this means for both of these teams moving forward, if we’re ever going to get another good game on Thursday Night Football, and more before going through the entire week 6 NFL slate and making their picks and predictions against the spread (1:15:32-1:36:09). Also joining the progrum fresh off a 2 touchdown week including a 98 yard bomb agains the Steelers is WR for the Buffalo Bills, Gabe Davis. Pat, Gabe, and AJ chat about the Bills’ culture as a whole, is thoughts on Bills Mafia, what he was thinking when he caught that big bomb from Josh Allen, his thoughts on playing the Chiefs this week, and much more (44:20-58:46). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. We'll see you on Overreaction Monday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
